long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pitch.Link Companion Browser Extension is an accompanying app to the Pitch.Link application. Use it to record video, Screen or both for walkthroughs or your outreach and send them out in a single click as a PitchLink right from the extension. You can use the snapshot function while researching prospects, competition and markets. you can take screenshots, capture links and take notes. You can then save these within projects and folders in the PitchLink Companion module right inside your PitchLink account. You can also create Projects and Folders on the fly. 
Record your video.
Record your screen.
Record both video and Screen together.
Take snapshots.
Save in Projects and folders inside your PitchLink account.
Create Projects and Folders on the fly.
Send PitchLink to your prospect/colleague/customer right from the extension.
Use your PitchLink id and password to log in
